item.description:
The Social Life of Healthcare: How & Why Consumers & Industry are Using Social Media (HBA GP Webinar)

When: Tuesday, June 5, 2012 | 12:00 pm- 1:00pm Time zone: EDT

Learn more and register on https://netforum.avectra.com/eweb/DynamicPage.aspx?Site=HBA&WebCode=EventDetail&evt_key=9be69a4f-408d-4caf-9970-7d7a8e3d3534&msm=2886d38b-ac5e-43ad-9425-c2f0edb2350b&cst=63c24403-03b4-489b-a261-90862f772844&ent=538dc173-123b-41a3-ac60-9e1f5295dac8.

Â 

Get a deep understanding of how health consumers and companies are using social media. Learn about the latest social trends including Google+ and Pinterest. Find out what success looks like in a social media health campaign.
item.name: How & Why Consumers & Industry are Using Social Media
